text:
有了明确的目标，就有了努力的方向。 比如，如果目标是考研，那么从大一开始就要注重基础知识的学习，积极参加学术活动，提高自己的专业素养。 同时，要了解考研的相关信息，制定合理的学习计划。 如果目标是就业，那么就要注重实践能力的培养，参加实习、社团活动等，积累工作经验，提高自己的综合素质。
二、良好的时间管理
trans:
With a clear goal, there is a direction to strive for. For example, if the goal is the further study, then you should concentrate on the study of basic knowledge from the first year of college, and actively participate in academic activities to improve your professional skills. At the same time, it is necessary to learn about the relevant information of the examination and make a reasonable study plan. If the goal is to get a job, then it is essential to focus on the cultivation of practices, participating in internships, club activities, etc., to gain work experience and improve your overall quality.
2. Good Time Management
